actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: Relating to the tariff treatment of paintings imported for the use of any public library, any other public institution, or any nonprofit institution established for educational, scientific, literary, or philosophical purposes, or for the encouragement of the fine arts.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment of paintings imported for the use of any public library, any other public institution, or any nonprofit institution established for educational, scientific, literary, or philosophical purposes, or for the encouragement of the fine arts.

titles.title: Relating to the tariff treatment of paintings imported for the use of any public library, any other public institution, or any nonprofit institution established for educational, scientific, literary, or philosophical purposes, or for the encouragement of the fine arts.
